description:
The popular horror film 'The Exorcist’ didn't come from a screenwriter's imagination: it came from real-life events.

About Thoughty2
Thoughty2 (Arran) is a British YouTuber and gatekeeper of useless facts. Thoughty2 creates mind-blowing factual videos about science, tech, history, opinion and just about everything else.
#Thoughty2

title: The REAL Story Behind 'The Exorcist’!
